events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for several days.
The issue described by the customer matches common delay keywords such as 'still hasn't arrived' and 'tracking info hasn't updated'.
Assigned the delivery support agent to handle the customer's delayed shipment inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order delay. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipping status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the last tracking update was from five days ago indicating it left the sorting facility.
I’ve contacted the courier and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. Your package is expected to be delivered within the next 3 days.
Thanks for the update, but I’m disappointed because I really needed the item sooner. Please let me know if there’s any faster option.
I understand your situation and can offer you an expedited shipping voucher for your next purchase as an apology for this inconvenience.
That sounds good, thank you for the gesture. I appreciate your help resolving this.
Glad to hear you’re satisfied. Your case will remain open until delivery is confirmed, but feel free to reach out anytime.
We just wanted to check in to confirm your order was successfully delivered and that everything is in order.
Yes, I received the package today and it is all perfect. Thanks again for your assistance!
Closing this case now as the delivery was completed successfully and customer is satisfied with the outcome.
